articles.title: Kim Jong Un Meets Song Tao
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Meets Song Tao
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, on Saturday met with Song Tao, head of the International Liaison Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China who is on a visit to the DPRK by leading the Chinese art troupe.
					 He warmly welcomed Song Tao and his party visiting the DPRK with a prestigious large-scale art troupe and had a cordial talk with them.
					
					 At the meeting Song Tao conveyed the warm greetings of General Secretary Xi Jinping to Chairman Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Jong Un expressed thanks for this and extended his greetings to Xi Jinping and other Chinese party and government leaders. They he said with deep emotion that the Chinese comrades accorded cordial hospitality to him with utmost sincerity in token of warm comradely friendship during his recent unforgettable visit to China.
					
					 Song Tao gave his impressions of DPRK visit, saying that they have personally experienced and been specially and deeply impressed by the warm feelings and intense and special hospitality of the Korean party and government to the Chinese art troupe from the first moment of its arrival.
					
					 He expressed their heartfelt thanks to Kim Jong Un and to the WPK and the DPRK government and the Korean people.
					
					 Kim Jong Un said that it is due obligation and behavior of the host and close friend for him to personally undertake the reception of the art troupe and give special treatment to it as the art troupe was personally selected and dispatched by Xi Jinping with special attention. All the relevant fields of the Korean party and government would provide all conditions for the Chinese art troupe at the highest level and on a top-priority basis during its stay, he added.
					
					 He wished the Chinese art troupe good success in its performances during its visit to Pyongyang and hoped that the peoples of the two countries would further deepen their understanding of each other and a new era of the DPRK-China art exchange be made with this visit as a momentum.
					
					 Exchanged in earnest at the meeting were profound views on the important matters of mutual concern of the WPK and the CPC and the international situation.
					
					 Expressing satisfaction over the recent development of the relations between the two parties and countries, the Supreme Leader said that he would positively carry forward and develop the traditional DPRK-China friendship into a fresh phase of development as required by a new era by further strengthening of the bilateral relations between the two parties including exchange of high-level delegations and undertaking the brisk cooperation and visits in various fields and sectors.
					
					 Noting it is the unshakable policy of the Chinese party and government to creditably preserve, consolidate and develop the China-DPRK relations, Song Tao said that they would make a fresh contribution to promoting the prolonged and stable development of the China-DPRK relations, providing the two countries and their peoples with happiness and ensuring peace and stability on the peninsula.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Grand Banquet for Chinese Art Troupe
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Grand Banquet for Chinese Art Troupe
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, gave a grand banquet on Saturday evening in welcome of the DPRK visit by the Chinese art troupe headed by Song Tao, head of the International Liaison Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.
					 Present there were Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, Ri Su Yong and Kim Yong Chol, members of the Political Bureau and vice-chairmen of the C.C., WPK, Kim Yo Jong, alternate member of the Political Bureau and first vice department director of the C.C., WPK, Jo Yong Won, Kwon Hyok Bong, Kim Pyong Ho, Hong Kwang Sun, Kim Song Nam, Ri Chang Gun and Ryu Myong Son, vice department directors of the C.C., WPK, Pak Chun Nam, minister of Culture, and other officials of the C.C., WPK and those concerned.
					
					 Present there on invitation were Song Tao, head of the International Liaison Department of the C.C., CPC, all the members of the Chinese art troupe, Li Jinjun, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and officials of the Chinese embassy here.
					
					 When the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and his wife Ri Sol Ju appeared at the banquet hall together with Song Tao and other Chinese guests, all the participants enthusiastically welcomed them with loud applause.
					
					 Kim Jong Un warmly welcomed the Chinese art troupe's visit to the DPRK.
					
					 First, a performance was given by the Korean artistes including those of the Samjiyon Orchestra in welcome of the Chinese art troupe at the banquet.
					
					 Then, toasts were made by Choe Ryong Hae and Song Tao.
					
					 The speakers expressed the steadfast will of the two parties and two peoples to more beautifully decorate the flower garden of the DPRK-China friendship and fully demonstrate the invincible friendship and unity at home and abroad and further develop them, which have been brought by the supreme leaders of the two parties and two peoples.
					
					 The banquet proceeded in a friendly and amicable atmosphere.

articles.title: First Lady of DPRK Enjoys Performance of Chinese Art Troupe
articles.content:
First Lady of DPRK Enjoys Performance of Chinese Art Troupe
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The Chinese art troupe gave its premiere for the 31st April Spring Friendship Art Festival at the Mansudae Art Theatre on Saturday.
					 First Lady Ri Sol Ju enjoyed a ballet choreodrama "Giselle" given by the National Ballet of China, together with Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Su Yong, Kim Yong Chol, Kim Yo Jong, Pak Chun Nam and other senior party and government officials.
					
					 When the First Lady arrived at the theatre, she was warmly greeted by Song Tao, head of the International Liaison Department of the C.C., Communist Party of China, Li Qun, vice-minister of Culture and Tourism of China, and Li Jinjun, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK.
					
					 She warmly welcomed the Chinese art troupe's visit to the DPRK and had a friendly talk with the guests in an amicable atmosphere before watching the performance.
					
					 The National Ballet of China wonderfully represented "Giselle" with high artistry, touching the heartstrings of the audience.
					
					 At the end of the performance, spectators mounted the stage to present bouquets to the performers, raising loud applause.
					
					 Ri Sol Ju, together with senior party and government officials, congratulated the performers on their successful performance and extended warm greetings to them.

articles.title: Talks between Officials of WPK and CPC Held
articles.content:
Talks between Officials of WPK and CPC Held
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Talks were held here on Saturday between Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), and Song Tao, head of the International Liaison Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China (CPC).
					 At the talks both sides exchanged deep views on further developing the relations between the WPK and the CPC on the basis of the agreement made at the historic meeting of the top leaders of the two countries.
					
					 The talks proceeded in a friendly atmosphere.
					
					 Present at the talks from the DPRK side were Ryu Myong Son, vice department director of the C.C., WPK, and officials of the International Department of the C.C., WPK, and from the Chinese side were officials of the International Liaison Department of the C.C., CPC, and Li Jinjun, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK.

articles.title: DPRK Embassy in Beijing Hosts Reception
articles.content:
DPRK Embassy in Beijing Hosts Reception
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The DPRK embassy in Beijing hosted a reception on April 12 ahead of the 106th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present at the reception on invitation were Wang Chen, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Communist Party of China and vice-chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress, Wang Yajun, deputy head of the International Liaison Department of the C.C., CPC, Kong Xuanyou, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Song Yancao, deputy director of the Office of International Military Cooperation of the Central Military Commission, Wu Donghe, chairman of the China-DPRK Friendship Association, and other officials concerned of China, and foreign diplomatic envoys to China.
					
					 On hand were Ji Jae Ryong, DPRK ambassador to China, and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 Prior to the reception, the participants looked round the photos dealing with the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's visit to China.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.
					
					 Ji Jae Ryong said that the traditional DPRK-China friendship, personally provided and cultivated by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il together with the Chinese leaders of elder generations with much care, is now vigorously developing at a fresh high stage under the deep care of the supreme leaders of the two countries.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un made his first unofficial visit to China like lightning with the unshakable will to strengthen the DPRK-China friendship on a new high level, true to the noble intention of the preceding leaders. And the supreme leaders of the two countries had in-depth exchange of views on the important matters including the development of the bilateral relations of friendship and handing of the situation on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The DPRK will do its utmost to steadily develop the traditional DPRK-China friendly and cooperative relations together with Chinese comrades, true to the intention of the supreme leaders of the two countries, in the future, too.
					
					 Wang Chen said that President Kim Il Sung, the great founder and leader of the Korean party and state, visited China more than forty times in his lifetime, forging deep friendship with the Chinese leaders of elder generation, and made great contributions to consolidating the China-DPRK friendly and cooperative relations.
					
					 The traditional China-DPRK friendship is a common asset of both sides, he said, adding: As mentioned by General Secretary Xi Jinping, the Chinese party and government are attaching great importance to the China-DPRK friendly cooperative relations and it is their consistent policy to creditably defend, cement and develop the relations.
					
					 The Chinese party and government sincerely hope that the economy of the DPRK would develop and its people would enjoy a happy life, and support the Korean people steadily advancing along the road of socialism under the guidance of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Chairman Kim Jong Un, he stressed.

articles.title: DPRK Government Delegation Visits Tajikistan
articles.content:
DPRK Government Delegation Visits Tajikistan
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- A government delegation of the DPRK led by Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho visited Tajikistan on April 13 and 14.
					 During the visit Ri Yong Ho had a talk with his Tajik counterpart Sirodjidin Aslov.
					
					 At the talk both sides discussed the issues for developing the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries in different fields and strengthening mutual cooperation in the international arena.
					
					 Sirodjidin Aslov said that Tajikistan fully supports all the peace-loving measures of the DPRK for improvement of the inter-Korean relations, sincerely wishing the Korean people bigger successes in the building of a powerful country under the leadership of the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Ri Yong Ho paid a courtesy call on Tajik Deputy Prime Minister Ibrohim Azim.
					
					 The DPRK government delegation left Dushanbe on Sunday.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- A national meeting to celebrate the 106th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung took place in Pyongyang Saturday.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and premier of the Cabinet, senior party and government officials, the chairman of a friendly party, leading officials of armed forces organs, members of the party central leadership organ in Pyongyang, officials of the Party Central Committee, armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions, teaching staff and students of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School and Kang Pan Sok Revolutionary School, officials of institutions and industrial establishments in Pyongyang city, labor innovators, bereaved families of the revolutionary martyrs, congratulatory groups and delegations of overseas Koreans and compatriots and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of t
					
					 he Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Present on invitation were foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations and military attaches here and other foreign guests.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam made a report.
					
					 He said that April 15 when the President was born is the greatest auspicious day of the nation unprecedented in the nation's history spanning 5 000 years and a revolutionary holiday common to humankind on which they acclaimed the illustrious great man.
					
					 The reporter continued:
					
					 Comrade Kim Il Sung is the sun of Juche who pioneered and led to victory the new era of history which advances under the banner of independence.
					
					 He resolutely rejected flunkeyism, dogmatism and dependence on foreign forces since the first day of his revolutionary struggle and paved the unique way of carving out the destiny of the country and people independently and creatively and thus brought about an unprecedented great change in the revolution and construction with transparent faith in independence and pluck.
					
					 By founding the Juche idea, the great leader effected a change in the mental and moral life of humankind and put the trend of history on the orbit of independence. This revolutionary exploit of the President will shine long along with the popular masses' cause of independence.
					
					 He is a peerlessly elder statesman who set an example of the times by which the revolution and construction are advanced on the principle of independence, and a peerlessly great man and founding father of socialist Korea who consolidated the eternal cornerstone for the completion of the cause of independence of the popular masses, the socialist cause.
					
					 He built the revolutionary party of Juche type, the state and the army and provided a powerful political weapon for the revolution and construction.
					
					 He is the eternal father of the nation who devoted his all to the accomplishment of the cause of national reunification for the complete independence and sovereignty of the country and the nation and the outstanding leader of the world revolution who made undying contributions to realizing the human cause of independence.
					
					 His revolutionary idea and cause of independence have been given a steady continuity under the guidance of leader Kim Jong Il and the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and have emerged victorious century after century.
					
					 The reporter called for accelerating the completion of the cause of building a powerful socialist country and the cause of Juche revolution under the uplifted banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 Meetings were held in provinces, cities and counties and at industrial complexes on the same day.

articles.title: Senior Party and Government Officials Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Senior Party and Government Officials Visit Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Senior party and government officials visited Mangyongdae on April 15, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They included Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the WPK Central Committee, Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee and vice-chairman of the SAC, and the chairperson of a friendly party, and officials of the ministries and national institutions.
					
					 They toured the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum.
					
					 At the old home of the President in Mangyongdae, they looked round the historical relics showing the noble traits of the President and his family members.

articles.title: Foreign Guests and Overseas Koreans Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Foreign Guests and Overseas Koreans Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Foreign diplomatic envoys, representatives of international bodies and military attaches here, delegations of Juche idea study groups and party delegations from different countries and families of those related to the revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung from abroad, congratulatory groups of Koreans in Japan and the General Association of Koreans in China for celebrating the Day of the Sun and other overseas Koreans and foreign guests visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Sunday, the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung. 
					 They paid tribute to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They paid homage to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il at the halls of immortality where they lie in state.
					
					 They went round the halls where the orders the great leaders received are on display and the halls that house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them for their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.
					
					 Meanwhile, the chief and members of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun to pay tribute to the great leaders on the same day.

articles.title: Foreign Guests and Overseas Koreans Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Foreign Guests and Overseas Koreans Visit Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Participants in the 31st April Spring Friendship Art Festival and the 20th Kimilsungia Festival, party delegations of different countries and families of those related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle abroad visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Being briefed on the revolutionary career of the President, the visitors went round historic relics preserved at his old home in Mangyongdae.
					
					 They also toured the venue of the 20th Kimilsungia Festival, the Korean Revolution Museum, the National Gifts Exhibition House, the Tower of the Juche Idea, etc.

articles.title: Floral Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il on Day of Sun
articles.content:
Floral Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il on Day of Sun
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons, civilians from all walks of life and youths and students in the DPRK visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il across the country to pay tribute.
					 Seen standing before the statues of the great leaders on Mansu Hill was a floral basket from the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Laid at the statues were floral baskets together with bouquets in the names of party, armed forces and power organs, public bodies, ministries, national institutions, units of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, institutions, enterprises and factories and schools in Pyongyang.
					
					 A floral basket in the name of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front was placed there.
					
					 The visitors paid tribute to the statues of the great leaders.
					
					 Floral baskets, together with bouquets and flowers, in the names of KPA and KPISF units, institutions and enterprises were laid before the statues of the great leaders at Kim Il Sung University, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security, the Mansudae Art Studio and other places of Pyongyang.
					
					 Servicepersons, working people, youths and students in various parts of the country visited the statues of the great leaders and large portraits of the smiling great leaders in their residential areas to pay tribute.

articles.title: Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
articles.content:
Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory letter from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on Sunday.
					 The letter said that President Kim Il Sung is an outstanding thinker-theoretician and a great man of action who brightly showed the road ahead of the times and revolution and put the modern history on an orbit of independence with his undying Juche idea. He is also the savior of national resurrection and the father of socialist Korea who defeated the most ferocious two imperialisms in one generation to save the country and the nation and built an invincible power independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in defence, it added.
					
					 Noting that the President gave birth to Chongryon and leader Kim Jong Il spared no efforts to lead it to become an example of the world's overseas compatriots' movement, the letter said:
					
					 The patriotic cause of Chongryon came to enter a fresh historic stage and the great leaders' feats and history of benevolent love for it are shining more brilliantly thanks to respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The letter expressed the resolve to reliably defend and add luster to the idea and leadership exploits performed by the great leaders for the development of Chongryon and the movement of Koreans in Japan and further strengthen Chongryon, which bears a part in accomplishing the cause of Juche, into a dignified overseas citizens' organization of the DPRK throwing in its lot with the homeland.
					
					 We will glorify the 24th Congress of Chongryon due in this meaningful year marking the 70th birthday of the DPRK as a historic occasion of strikingly displaying the nature of Chongryon which has covered the glorious course of development under the care of the peerlessly great men, and a congress of glory and loyalty, victory and unity in which a fresh milestone for the movement of Koreans in Japan is made.

articles.title: Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from C.C., AINDF
articles.content:
Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from C.C., AINDF
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory letter from the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) on Sunday.
					 The letter said that the birth of President Kim Il Sung was a great fortune for the Korean nation as it greeted its hero for the first time in the history of 5,000 years and a great happy event in human history as it brought the bright dawn of the independent era to this planet.
					
					 The revolutionary career and feats of the President whom the Korean nation acclaimed for the first time in its history of thousands of years will go down forever along with the victorious advance of the revolutionary cause of Juche, the cause of national independence, it said.
					
					 His idea and cause had been firmly defended and successfully carried forward and developed by leader Kim Jong Il and now the nation is ushering in the greatest heyday of Juche Korea under the guidance of Kim Jong Un, another heaven-sent great man whom the nation acclaimed., the letter stressed.
					
					 It expressed the will to strive to rouse all the patriotic people in the south to the struggle for implementing the great programme of national reunification set forth by Kim Jong Un, regarding it as the banner of sure victory, and glorify this year as an eventful year when strong thunder of spring for national reunification is brought By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 The letter said that the dawn of a new world, in which 80 million fellow countrymen will enjoy happiness and comfort in a reunified powerful country, will surely come as Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il are always alive as the sun of Juche and there is the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Day of Sun Marked in DPRK
articles.content:
Day of Sun Marked in DPRK
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The service personnel and people of the DPRK significantly celebrated the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung - the Day of the Sun.
					 The visitors to the park in the plaza of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, the sacred temple of Juche where the President and leader Kim Jong Il lie in state, paid homage to the portraits of the smiling great leaders.
					
					 Service personnel, working people from all walks of life and school youth and children paid tribute to their statues on Mansu Hill and in other parts of the country and the portraits of the smiling great leaders across the country.
					
					 Many people visited the 20th Kimilsungia Festival venue in Pyongyang and Kimilsungia exhibition halls in provinces.
					
					 Working people from all walks of life visited fine art exhibitions in the capital city and localities of the country.
					
					 Art performances were given at theaters, halls, outdoor stages, etc. across the country to celebrate the Day of the Sun.
					
					 Children across the country joined the Korean Children's Union on this occasion.

articles.title: Fireworks Displayed in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Fireworks Displayed in Pyongyang
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Fireworks were displayed here Sunday in celebration of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Both banks of the River Taedong centering around Kim Il Sung Square and the Tower of the Juche Idea were crowded with people from all walks of life Sunday evening to see the fireworks.
					
					 Fireworks were displayed in the nocturnal sky amid the playing of the solemn song "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung".
					
					 The moment the fireworks appeared, the spectators gave shouts of joy.
					
					 The playing of song "Cheers of the People" revved up the festive mood.

articles.title: Papers Call for Glorifying Socialist Country of Juche
articles.content:
Papers Call for Glorifying Socialist Country of Juche
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Newspapers here today, in editorials marking the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, call for eternally glorifying the socialist country of Juche, heritage left by the President out of patriotism.
					 Rodong Sinmun says that the DPRK is the glorious country of Kim Il Sung shining with his august name and exploits.
					
					 Thanks to April 15 on which the sun of Juche rose, Korea came to shed its bright rays on the world map and epoch-making changes were brought about on this land where backwardness and poverty had once prevailed, it says, and goes on:
					
					 As there was the outstanding leadership of the President, the example of the times which defends the dignity and interests of the country and the nation was set and the socialist country of Juche, in which the independent demand of the popular masses was successfully embodied, emerged.
					
					 The DPRK is enjoying only victories and glory century after century as there is the heritage associated with the whole patriotic life of the great leader.
					
					 Under his leadership the principle of national independence and national self-sustenance was thoroughly embodied in the revolution and construction and the DPRK greeted all the glory which could not be enjoyed in the nation's history spanning thousands of years.
					
					 Our socialist country in which the people's beautiful dream and idea come true is the crystal of warm loving care shown by the President for the people.
					
					 The Korean people will glorify their socialist country as the country of the President forever by conveying his benevolence generation after generation.
					
					 Minju Joson calls on all the people to work hard to bring into a brilliant reality the patriotic desire of the President for a powerful country under the leadership of the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Joint Performances of April Art Festival
articles.content:
Joint Performances of April Art Festival
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Joint performances of the participants in the 31st April Spring Friendship Art Festival were given at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre, the Ponghwa Art Theatre and the Pyongyang Circus Theater in the city of Pyongyang on Sunday.
					 Among the audience were Choe Ryong Hae, Presidium member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the DPRK State Affairs Commission and vice chairman of the C.C., WPK, Pak Pong Ju, Presidium member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK, vice-chairman of the DPRK State Affairs Commission  and premier of the Cabinet, and other senior party and government officials, the chairman of a friendly party, officials of ministries and national institutions and working people in the city.
					
					 Enjoying the performance were also overseas compatriots including the congratulatory groups of Koreans in Japan and the General Association of Koreans in China for celebrating the Day of the Sun, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, diplomatic envoys and representatives of international bodies, military attaches, members of foreign embassies here and other foreign guests.
					
					 Colorful numbers such as songs, musical instruments and dances were given by foreign and overseas compatriot artistes including a female soloist of the Lao State Art Troupe, Bulgarian opera singer, and artistes of the Russian State Academic People's Chorus Named after M. E. Pyatnichki, and the Volinaya Stepi Cossack Art Troupe of Russia.
					
					 Put on the stages were acrobatic and magic pieces.
					
					 Floral baskets were conveyed to the performers in congratulation of their successful performances.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youths and Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youths and Students Held
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youths and students took place in Pyongyang and other parts of the country on April 15, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun).
					 Amid the playing of the song "Let's Sing of the Day of the Sun", dancing parties started in the venues including the plazas of the Monument to Party Founding, the Arch of Triumph and the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium.
					
					 The participants danced to the tunes of such songs as "Song of Mangyongdae" and "We Sing of Our Country Holding the Leader in High Esteem", recollecting the revolutionary career of the President.
					
					 Reverence for leader Kim Jong Il who spared nothing for the youths could be read on the faces of the participants dancing to the tune of the song "Let's Sing of General Dear to People".
					
					 They cheerfully danced, full of conviction that the country will as ever shine as a youth power thanks to the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, singing in chorus "Cheers of the People".

articles.title: Mangyongdae Prize National Martial Art Championship Closes
articles.content:
Mangyongdae Prize National Martial Art Championship Closes
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The Mangyongdae Prize National Martial Art Championship closed with due ceremony at the Taekwon-Do Hall on Sunday.
					 The Pyongyang City Taekwon-Do team took the first place in total standings.
					
					 The North Hwanghae Provincial Taekwon-Do team came first in Taekwon-Do event.
					
					 Men players of the South Phyongan Provincial Taekwon-Do team and women players of the Pyongyang City Taekwon-Do team won the team sparring matches.
					
					 The South Hamgyong Provincial Taekwon-Do team took the first place in Paduk event.
					
					 Kim Kwang Chon (man) of the South Phyongan Provincial Taekwon-Do team and Hong Yun Mi (woman) of the Taekwon-Do team of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee received the individual technical prize in Taekwon-Do event and Jon Kum Sok (man) of the South Hamgyong Provincial Taekwon-Do team and Jang Ri Gyong (woman) of the Taekwon-Do team of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee got the individual technical prize in Paduk event.
					
					 Present at the closing ceremony were Choe Hwi, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea who is chairman of the National Sports Guidance Committee, Kim Yong Ho, secretary general of the Cabinet, Kim Chun Sik, secretary general of the National Sports Guidance Committee, officials concerned, sportspersons and working citizens.
					
					 Prior to the ceremony there was a men's team sparring match between the North Hwanghae and South Phyongan provincial teams.

articles.title: Men's Basketball Game Held
articles.content:
Men's Basketball Game Held
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- There took place a men's basketball game between the April 25 Sports Team and the Amnokgang Sports Team at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium on April 15 in celebration of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Watching the game were officials concerned, sportspersons and youth and students in the city of Pyongyang.
					
					 In the game the April 25 Sports Team defeated its rival 73:70.

articles.title: Joint National Meeting of KCU Bodies Held
articles.content:
Joint National Meeting of KCU Bodies Held
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- There was a joint national meeting of the organizations of the Korean Children's Union (KCU) at Mangyongdae Revolutionary School on Sunday in celebration of the 106th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Taking part in it were delegates of KCU organizations from each province and schoolchildren in the city of Pyongyang and those pupils to join the Union.
					
					 Present there on invitation were Choe Hwi, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), Kim Su Gil, chairman of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK, Jon Kwang Ho, vice-premier of the Cabinet, and officials of the youth league, war veterans and persons of merit.
					
					 Pak Chol Min, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League, made a report.
					
					 He noted that President Kim Il Sung provided the glorious tradition of the Korean children's movement.
					
					 He stressed the need for all the KCU members to be always ready for the socialist country in the embrace of the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 There was an admission ceremony.
					
					 Led by Choe Hwi, the pupils joining the KCU took an oath.
					
					 Officials, war veterans and persons of merit tied red neckties around their necks and attached KCU badges on their chests.
					
					 The pupils made the first greetings of the KCU member, responding to the slogan "Let us be always ready for socialist country".
					
					 O Ryong Thaek, rector of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School, Song Chang Il, a researcher at Kim Il Sung University, and Pak Yong Mi, player of the Pyongyang Sports Team, in their congratulatory speeches appealed to those KCU members to prepare themselves to be revolutionary able persons, knowledgeable, virtuous and healthy to keep the oath they took before the KCU flag.

articles.title: First-term Camping of Children Starts in DPRK
articles.content:
First-term Camping of Children Starts in DPRK
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The first-term camping started in children's camps across the country on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Taking part in the camping are members of the Children's Union who have distinguished themselves in study, organizational life, socio-political activities and do-good-thing movement.
					
					 A camping starting ceremony was held at the Mangyongdae Children's Camp on Sunday.
					
					 Present there were Kim Su Gil, chairman of the Pyongyang City Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, teaching staff and employees of the camp and campers.
					
					 The participants placed a floral basket and bunches of flowers before a mosaic depicting the image of President Kim Il Sung at the camp and paid tribute to him.
					
					 A report was made to be followed by speeches.

articles.title: 2018 School Year of Korean University Begins
articles.content:
2018 School Year of Korean University Begins
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- There took place an entrance ceremony of Korean University of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) for Juche 107 (2018) in Tokyo on April 10.
					 Present at the ceremony were Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, Pae Ik Ju, its vice-chairman, Kang Chu Ryon, its vice-chairwoman and chairwoman of the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Democratic Korean Women in Japan, Song Kun Hak, director of the Education Department of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, Han Tong Song, rector of Korean University, Jang Pyong Thae, honorary professor of Korean University, senior officials of the central organizations and business bodies of Chongryon, new comers and parents, teachers and students of the university and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 Congratulatory messages from the Education Commission of the DPRK and several universities of the homeland were introduced at the ceremony.
					
					 Ho Jong Man said in his congratulatory speech that Korean University is a historical and traditional, dignified university of overseas citizens of the DPRK. The great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il showed deep loving care for the university and the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un is meticulously leading the university, he added.
					
					 Rector Han Tong Song made a report at the ceremony to be followed by speeches.

articles.title: Korean Books Donated to Russia
articles.content:
Korean Books Donated to Russia
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- A Korean book-donating ceremony took place in Vladivostok, Russia on April 4 ahead of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Attending it were figures of the Maritime Territorial Branch Committee of "A Just Russia" and OTV Television Broadcasting Corporation of Maritime Territory, masses and officials of the DPRK mission in Vladivostok.
					
					 Donated there were works of the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Aleksei Kozitski, chairman of the Maritime Territorial Branch Committee of "A Just Russia", extended warm greetings to all Korean people on the occasion of the 106th birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people and the world progressives. He continued:
					
					 Kim Jong Un's works serve as the precious guidelines helping the Korean party and people invariably advance along the road of socialism.
					
					 The works will be greatly helpful to the people in the Far Eastern region who are sympathetic with the reality of the DPRK and desirous of diverse cooperation with the DPRK and to the Maritime Territorial Branch Committee of "A Just Russia" keen to boost the solidarity with the Workers' Party of Korea in particular.
					
					 I will make all members of the branch committee deeply study the works.

articles.title: Highest Glory to Kim Jong Il by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
Highest Glory to Kim Jong Il by Swiss Organizations
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on April 4 on the occasion of the 25th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The great leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the NDC of the DPRK is a reflection of the boundless reverence of the Korean party, army and people.
					
					 Kim Jong Il turned the DPRK into an invincible powerful country with his original Songun politics and smashed the hostile forces' every provocation.
					
					 He conducted energetic activities for peace and reunification of the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The respected Marshal Kim Jong Un is winning greater victory by successfully carrying forward his idea and cause.
					
					 We pay the highest glory to leader Kim Jong Il, the sun of Juche.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe al jefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del CC del PCCh
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe al jefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del CC del PCCh
Pyongyang, 15 de abril (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio el dia 14 a Song Tao, jefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China, quien esta de visita en Corea encabezando el grupo artistico de China.
					El Maximo Dirigente dio la calurosa bienvenida a Song Tao quien visito a la RPDC conduciendo el ilustre grupo artistico chino de gran tamano y su comitiva y converso con el en un ambiente cordial.
					
					En la ocasion, Song Tao le transmitio al Maximo Dirigente el saludo caliente de Xi Jinping.
					
					El dirigente coreano expreso agradecimiento al respecto y transmitio su saludo a Xi Jinping y otros cuadros directivos del partido y gobierno de China y recordo con emocion los dias inolvidables de su reciente visita a China cuando los companeros chinos le trataron con toda sinceridad mostrando la fraternidad camaraderil y el sentimiento amistoso.
					
					Song Tao hablo de sus impresiones diciendo que desde los primeros momentos de su llegada a Corea recibio una gran emocion especial experimentando directamente el afecto fraternal y la hospitalidad entusiasta y particular del partido y gobierno de Corea.
					
					Y expreso las gracias sinceras al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, el PTC, el gobierno y pueblo de Corea.
					
					Deviene la obligacion natural del dueno y amigo intimo el acoger excepcionalmente como su trabajo directo el grupo artistico que el Secretario General Xi Jinping selecciono personalmente y envio con la atencion particular, dijo el Maximo Dirigente y aseguro que durante la estancia del grupo artistico de China se aseguraran en el nivel supremo y con prioridad todas las condiciones bajo la atencion de todos los dominios interesados del partido y gobierno coreanos.
					
					Deseo que durante la visita a Pyongyang el grupo artistico chino logre los exitos excelentes en sus actividades de funcion y que este evento sirviera de un motivo para entenderse mas los sentimientos de los pueblos de ambos paises y se creara la nueva epoca de intercambio artistico Corea-China.
					
					En la ocasion fueron intercambiadas las opiniones profundas sobre los problemas importantes de interes mutuo entre el PTC y el PCCh y la situacion internacional.
					
					Expresando la satisfaccion sobre el desarrollo de las relaciones entre los dos partidos y dos paises que se logran estos dias, el Maximo Dirigente senalo en la necesidad de fortalecer aun mas en el futuro las relaciones partidistas incluyendo el intercambio de las delegaciones de alto nivel entre los dos partidos y realizar animadamente la cooperacion y el viaje entre varios dominios y sectores para asi seguir llevando adelante activamente a la nueva etapa del desarrollo la tradicional amistad Corea-China conforme a la demanda de nueva epoca.
					
					Song Tao dijo que el partido y gobierno de China tiene la inconmovible orientacion de defender, fortalecer y desarrollar excelentemente las relaciones China-Corea y enfatizo en que impulsara el desarrollo prolongado y estable de las relaciones China-Corea, y hara la nueva contribucion a la preparacion de las felicidades para dos paises y ambos pueblos y la defensa de la paz y estabilidad de la Peninsula.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un ofrece gran banquete en honor de la visita a Corea del grupo artistico chino
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un ofrece gran banquete en honor de la visita a Corea del grupo artistico chino
Pyongyang, 15 de abril (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, ofrecio el dia 14 por la noche un gran banquete para dar bienvenida a la visita a Corea del grupo artistico de China, presidida por el jefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y vicepresidente del CE de la RPDC y del CC del PTC, Ri Su Yong y Kim Yong Chol, miembros del Buro Politico y vicepresidentes del CC del PTC, Kim Yo Jong, miembro suplente del Buro Politico y primera subjefa de departamento del CC del PTC, Jo Yong Won, Kwon Hyok Bong, Kim Pyong Ho, Hong Kwang Sun, Kim Song Nam, Ri Chang Gun y Ryu Myong Son, subjefes del departamento del CC del PTC, Pak Chun Nam, ministro de Cultura, y otros funcionarios del CC del PTC y los interesados.
					
					Fueron invitados a la recepcion Song Tao, jefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del CC del PCCh, los miembros del grupo artistico chino, Li Jinjun, embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de China en la RPDC y otros miembros de la embajada china.
					
					Cuando el Maximo Dirigente y su senora Ri Sol Ju salieron al lugar de banquete junto con Song Tao y otros huespedes chinos, todos los espectadores les dieron la calurosa bienvenida con aplausos atronadores.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente felicito calurosamente el grupo artistico chino que visita a la RPDC.
					
					En la ocasion, hubo la funcion de la Orquesta Samjiyon y otros artistas coreanos para el grupo artistico chino.
					
					Luego, hubo los discursos de brindis de Choe Ryong Hae y Song Tao.
					
					Los oradores expresaron la voluntad firme de los dos partidos y dos pueblos de adornar mas hermosamente el jardin de amistad Corea-China, preparado por los Maximos Dirigentes de ambos partidos y paises, manifestar ampliamente la unidad invencible de amistad a todo el mundo y consolidarla y desarrollarla aun mas.
					
					El banquete se realizo como siempre en el ambiente rebosante del sentimiento amistoso.

articles.title: Ri Sol Ju presencia la funcion del grupo artistico de China
articles.content:
Ri Sol Ju presencia la funcion del grupo artistico de China
Pyongyang, 15 de abril (ACNC) -- En el Teatro de Arte Mansudae se efectuo exitosamente el dia 14 el estreno del grupo artistico de China participado en el 31o Festival Artistico de Amistad Abril en Primavera.
					La senora Ri Sol Ju vio el drama de ballet "Giselle" del Conjunto Central de Ballet de China junto con Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Su Yong, Kim Yong Chol, Kim Yo Jong, Pak Chun Nam y otros cuadros del partido y gobierno.
					
					En el teatro la senora Ri fue acogida Song Tao, jefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China, Li Jun, viceministro de Cultura y Turismo de China, y el embajador chino Li Jinjun en Corea.
					
					Ri dio calurosa bienvenida a la visita del grupo artistico chino a Corea y departio amistosamente en un ambiente ameno con los huespedes antes del inicio de la funcion.
					
					Los artistas chinos describieron excelentemente el drama de ballet "Giselle" demostrando sin reservas su alta habilidad artistica que encanto a los espectadores.
					
					Al termino de la funcion, los espectadores subieron a la escena para entregarles los ramos de flores a los artistas chinos y les dieron los aplausos calurosos.
					
					Ri Sol Ju felicito calurosamente junto con los cuadros del partido y gobierno los exitos de los artistas chinos logrados en la funcion y les envio cordiales saludos.

articles.title: Tienen lugar conversaciones entre Ri Su Yong y Song Tao
articles.content:
Tienen lugar conversaciones entre Ri Su Yong y Song Tao
Pyongyang, 15 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 14 en esta capital las conversaciones entre Ri Su Yong, miembro del Buro Politico y vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, y Song Tao, jefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China.
					En la ocasion, ambas partes intercambiaron las opiniones profundas para desarrollar las relaciones entre el PTC y el PCCh a base del acuerdo alcanzado en la Cumbre historica por los Maximos Dirigentes de los dos paises. 
					
					Las conversaciones transcurrieron siempre en un ambiente amistoso. 
					
					Participaron por la parte coreana el subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Ryu Myong Son, y los funcionarios del Departamento Internacional del CC del PTC y, por la china, los funcionarios del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del CC del PCCh y el embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario en Corea, Li Jinjun.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong se reune con la delegacion del Partido del Pueblo de Mongolia
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong se reune con la delegacion del Partido del Pueblo de Mongolia
Pyongyang, 15 de abril (ACNC) -- Ri Su Yong, miembro del Buro Politico y vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, converso el dia 14 con la delegacion del Partido del Pueblo de Mongolia, encabezada por su secretario general Dashzegve Amarbayasgalan, que esta de visita en Corea con motivo del Dia del Sol.
					Ri Su Yong dijo que bajo la sabia direccion del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, el PTC y el pueblo coreano logran exitos en la lucha por celebrar como festival de triunfadores el 70o aniversario de la fundacion de la RPDC con la capacidad de fortalecerse con medios propios como fuerza motriz y el poderio de la unidad monolitica.
					
					Expuso la posicion de consolidar y desarrollar las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos partidos y paises este ano del 70o aniversario del establecimiento de relaciones diplomaticas entre ambos paises.
					
					Dashzegve Amarbayasgalan deseo que bajo la direccion de Su Excelencia Mariscal Kim Jong Un, el pueblo coreano logre mayores exitos en la lucha por la prosperidad del pais.
					
					Expreso la conviccion de que el PPM ampliara y desarrollara las tradicionales relaciones bilaterales entre ambos partidos dando gran importancia a los vinculos con el PTC.
